ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: WHEN WHAT IS to happen comes to pass --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When the Event will come to pass
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When the forthcoming event does occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When the great event comes to pass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the inevitable event takes place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the Event inevitable cometh to pass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When the Event (i.e. the Day of Resurrection) befalls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:1] When the [imminent] Event comes to pass, [when] the Resurrection takes place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (When the event befalleth): '(When the event befalleth) He says: when the Day of Judgement comes.
